about_the_game:
Welcome to Kitten Kingdom, a charming 2D platformer game that's perfect for players of all ages. In this game, you'll join a group of adorable kittens as they run and jump through a vast, colorful world filled with money to collect and dangerous dogs to avoid.

As you explore the immersive world of Kitten Kingdom, you'll be able to escape the monotony of everyday life and lose yourself in hours of engaging gameplay. The cute graphics will keep you coming back for more. And the amazing soundtrack will have you humming along as you play.

So why wait? Start playing Kitten Kingdom today and experience the fun and joy of this charming game. With its engaging gameplay, cute graphics, and amazing soundtrack, it's sure to delight players of all ages.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Kitten Kingdom, a charming 2D platformer game that's perfect for players of all ages. In this game, you'll join a group of adorable kittens as they run and jump through a vast, colorful world filled with money to collect and dangerous dogs to avoid.

As you explore the immersive world of Kitten Kingdom, you'll be able to escape the monotony of everyday life and lose yourself in hours of engaging gameplay. The cute graphics will keep you coming back for more. And the amazing soundtrack will have you humming along as you play.

So why wait? Start playing Kitten Kingdom today and experience the fun and joy of this charming game. With its engaging gameplay, cute graphics, and amazing soundtrack, it's sure to delight players of all ages.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system. Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor). Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.

name: Kitten Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join adorable kittens in Kitten Kingdom, a 2D platformer game with engaging gameplay, cute graphics, and an amazing soundtrack. Explore a vast and colorful world, collect money, and navigate challenging obstacles. Escape the monotony of everyday life with this charming game for all ages.
